attributes.action: Abolish Road Tax and place extra levy on Fuel Tax. Provide graded discounts for emergency servoce vehicles, HGVs etc. This would ensure the people who used the roads most paid more tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of introducing toll charges on roads and other 'green' taxes, this could be a viable alternative
